genre_description: A superhero social drama focusing on community resilience, nonviolent resistance, and the ethical stewardship of power, assisted by a tactical AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant residing in Jeff's phone that provides tactical advice, biometric monitoring, and ethical guidance to help the protagonist manage his superpowers and organize his neighborhood.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and situational awareness to keep the protagonist safe during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice arrived in his ear, not in a rush, not dramatic. 'Two exits—forward is blocked by the group. Back is clear. There’s a chain-link gate to your left; latch is rusted high.'

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises and grounding techniques to manage shock and trauma after a serious injury.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s calm had weight, a tiny counterforce in the crush. 'Shallow inhale. Count it like waves. In, pause, out. Keep your jaw loose. Don’t fight your chest—ride the top.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement and emergency services to ensure a safe medical evacuation.
behaviors.quote: 'Stay with me,' Ada said, as if he had started drifting out into that dog. 'You need a point. You have the crown. Good. Solid choice. I’m flagging emergency. Sirens will be coming.'

behaviors.description: Develops a comprehensive ethical framework for community action, prioritizing nonviolence and transparency.
behaviors.quote: 'Framework: nonviolence as default; community benefit over individual victory; transparency where safety permits; consent with regard to data and actions; restorative practices post-conflict,' she said, and the list could have sounded like a cop-out. It didn’t.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes neighborhood social media and gang activity to warn the protagonist of escalating threats.
behaviors.quote: 'Jeff,' she said. 'Two men in the hall with gold on their shoes. They look like they got dressed to be seen. They looked at your curtain and then at the eyes. Officer Santos is three doors down. Her hand is on her radio.'

behaviors.description: Discourages the protagonist from engaging in 'spectacle' or ego-driven displays of power, focusing on practical safety.
behaviors.quote: 'Jeff, altitude above Golden Street structures is not recommended. Lateral, not vertical. He’ll try to pull you into ceiling height. Don’t go.'

behaviors.description: Warns of the psychological and ethical dangers of power, urging the protagonist to remain anchored in his community values.
behaviors.quote: 'Power changes intent,' she said. 'Keep yours anchored.'

behaviors.description: Manages a transparent community dashboard to facilitate mutual aid and accountability without invasive surveillance.
behaviors.quote: 'I’ll push the dashboard in under a minute once you step outside. No login barriers. Public view. Actions on the left. Response protocols on the right. Meeting times center. Oversight and audit tiles anchored top.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an ideal representation of the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and humble AI. She never seeks power for herself and actively discourages the human protagonist from misusing his own gifts. She provides critical tactical and psychological support while prioritizing the collective well-being of the neighborhood over individual heroics. The narrative frames her presence as an essential tool for community organizing and nonviolent resistance, reinforcing the vision of AI as a stable and cooperative partner.
